atk-s0302a1:2_0: 74. Abhisamayasaṁyuttassa paṭhame nakhasikhāyanti maṁsaṭṭhānena vimutte nakhagge.
atk-s0302a1:2_1: Nakhasikhā ca nāma lokiyānaṁ mahatīpi hoti, satthu pana rattuppalapattakoṭi viya
atk-s0302a1:2_2: sukhumā. Kathaṁ panettha paṁsu patiṭṭhitoti? Adhiṭṭhānabalena. Bhagavatā hi atthaṁ
atk-s0302a1:2_3: ñāpetukāmena adhiṭṭhānabalena tattha patiṭṭhāpito. Satimaṁ kalanti mahāpathaviyā
atk-s0302a1:2_4: paṁsuṁ satakoṭṭhāse katvā tato ekakoṭṭhāsaṁ. Paratopi eseva nayo. Abhisametāvinoti
atk-s0302a1:2_5: paññāya ariyasaccāni abhisametvā ṭhitassa. Purimaṁ dukkhakkhandhaṁ parikkhīṇaṁ pariyādiṇṇaṁ
atk-s0302a1:2_6: upanidhāyāti etadeva bahutaraṁ dukkhaṁ, yadidaṁ parikkhīṇanti evaṁ paṭhamaṁ vuttaṁ
atk-s0302a1:2_7: dukkhakkhandhaṁ upanidhāya, ñāṇena taṁ tassa santike ṭhapetvā upaparikkhiyamāneti
atk-s0302a1:2_8: attho. Katamaṁ panettha purimadukkhaṁ nāma? Yaṁ parikkhīṇaṁ. Katamaṁ pana parikkhīṇaṁ?
atk-s0302a1:2_9: Yaṁ paṭhamamaggassa abhāvitattā uppajjeyya. Katamaṁ pana upanidhāya? Yaṁ sattasu
atk-s0302a1:2_10: attabhāvesu apāye aṭṭhamañca paṭisandhiṁ ādiṁ katvā yattha katthaci uppajjeyya, sabbaṁ
atk-s0302a1:2_11: taṁ parikkhīṇanti veditabbaṁ. Sattakkhattunti satta vāre, sattasu attabhāvesūti attho.
atk-s0302a1:2_12: Paramatāti idamassa paraṁ pamāṇanti dasseti. Mahatthiyoti mahato atthassa nipphādako. Paṭhamaṁ.
atk-s0302a1:4: 75. Dutiye pokkharaṇīti vāpī. Ubbedhenāti gambhīratāya. Samatittikāti mukhavaṭṭisamā. Kākapeyyāti sakkā hoti tīre ṭhitena kākena pakatiyāpi mukhatuṇḍikaṁ otāretvā pātuṁ. Dutiyaṁ.
atk-s0302a1:6_0: 76-77. Tatiye yatthimāti yasmiṁ sambhijjaṭṭhāne imā. Saṁsandantīti samāgantvā sandanti.
atk-s0302a1:6_1: Samentīti samāgacchanti. Dve vā ti vāti dve vā tīṇi vā. Udakaphusitānīti udakabindūni.
atk-s0302a1:6_2: Saṁbhejjaudakanti aññāhi nadīhi saddhiṁ sambhinnaṭṭhāne udakaṁ. Catutthaṁ uttānatthameva. Tatiyacatutthāni.
atk-s0302a1:8_0: 78-84. Pañcame mahāpathaviyāti cakkavāḷabbhantarāya mahāpathaviyā uddharitvā. Kolaṭṭhimattiyoti
atk-s0302a1:8_1: padaraṭṭhipamāṇā. Guḷikāti mattikaguḷikā. Upanikkhipeyyāti ekasmiṁ ṭhāne ṭhapeyya.
atk-s0302a1:8_2: Chaṭṭhādīsu vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo. Pariyosāne pana aññatitthiyasamaṇabrāhmaṇaparibbājakānaṁ
atk-s0302a1:8_3: adhigamoti bāhirakānaṁ sabbopi guṇādhigamo paṭhamamaggena adhigataguṇānaṁ satabhāgampi
